title: SDF Param Error: Unable to set value for radius

content.raw:
When trying to insert a sphere or cylinder into the Model Editor, I get the following error and the sphere/cylinder comes up with a radius of 1 m instead of 0.5 m.

~~~
Error [Param.cc:181] Unable to set value [0,5] for key[radius]
~~~

The same error comes up when inserting these shapes on the main window, but the shape appears in the correct size.

This seems to have been introduced in the latest commits, I wasn't getting this error on Friday.

I've updated SDF to the latest default branch and the error persists.

The error seems to come from this call, but I'm not sure exactly where the problem lies.

~~~
sdf::ElementPtr cylinderElem = geomElem->AddElement("cylinder");
(cylinderElem->GetElement("radius"))->Set(_radius);
~~~

The same error comes up when inserting these shapes on the main window, but the shape appears in the correct size.

I've updated SDF to the latest default branch and the error persists.

The error seems to come from this call, but I'm not sure exactly where the problem lies.
